title: Document As-Built Condition
description: During construction, a pipe had to be rerouted from its planned location. A foreman must document this change on the as-built drawings.

tasks.description: Open the as-built drawings for the second-floor plumbing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct as-built drawing file is opened.

tasks.description: Mark the original pipe location as 'deleted' and draw the new route, adding dimensions and notes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The drawing is updated with a clear 'red-line' markup of the change.
